entry.title: Thursday: Rain at times heavy or snow. High 11.
entry.summary: Snow changing to rain at times heavy this morning. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Rainfall amount 25 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 70 this morning then becoming south 50 gusting to 90 this afternoon. High 11. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Showers. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Showers ending after midnight then partly cloudy. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 70 becoming west 30 gusting to 50 late this evening. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. Temperature steady near minus 2.
